info.name: Darkenbook MoX
info.description:
Based off of Darkenbook, made it into a personal project and I've been slowly updating it.
Many pages may not work, but I do take feedback via the discussions on userstyles.

(Screenshot of theme might be compressed, don't like it? Yell at the admin!)
Non-compressed version of screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/X2SFWZb.png
info.additionalInfo:
Custom Sidebar, Scrollbar and Background!

Comments are fun to read through!

(Pink style is hidden <3)
